display.title: Centripetal-Action
description: &&oA rifle is a precise instrument, one must play in tune, and in time&&r
An &&3Yttric Rifle&&r is a &&dcharged ranged weapon&&r with many firing modes, each consuming a different type of &&3reagent&&r.

Each mode has a &&dprecise audiovisual timing cue&&r to fire at full power without causing a deadly &&3overload&&r. It's safest to practice in a desolate area while aiming at a &&ePower Meter&&r, which nullifies shot effects.
&&7[&&r&&4Warning&&r&&7]&&r The &&3Explode&&r and &&3Void&&r modes can &&dremove blocks in a large area&&r. Type &&6/yttr:void_undo by {username}&&r to reverse accidental void damage.
